# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(cge LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(cge "")
set_target_properties(cge PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "cge")
set_target_properties(cge PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x86/release")

    GLFW_INCLUDE_NONE
    GLEW_NO_GLU
    GLEW_STATIC
)

    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
set_target_properties(cge PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(cge PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(cge PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(cge PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(cge PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET cge PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
